name: Mind the Negative
description:
MIND the NEGATIVE

Welcome to 2023. It's a New Year and a new chance to start it off Positive. So Mind the Negative, a game about using your Positivity to banish the Negative. Every time you Banish a Negative you gain point that when you accumulate enough points you level up. When you level up choose 1 of 3 skills to either gain or to to rank up.

If you can survive the entire 17 minutes you can finally relax.

- It's a old school arcade shooter style game.

 - survive 17 to win the game.

 - get a Hi-Score, Hi-Levels, Unlocks, Challenges, etc..

Created by: Pixel Jefe Games

Created with: Game Maker Studios 2

Created for: New Year, New Jam
